alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 8:57PM CST until December 15 at 9:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WILL BRING HEAVY SNOW TO MUCH OF THE AREA TONIGHT... .Precipitation from a slow moving storm system will change from rain and a wintry mix to snow tonight. The snow will be heavy at times, especially after midnight. Travel is expected to become hazardous overnight. ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Brown and Outagamie Counties. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep a flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
